subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Trust is the N.C.A.A.’s chief weapon against mischief, even though the truth is in no one’s best interest. Truth could doom bowls and dash television ratings and end careers.
snippet: Trust is the N.C.A.A.’s chief weapon against mischief, even though the truth is in no one’s best interest. Truth could doom bowls and dash television ratings and end careers.
